entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then 30 percent chance of drizzle late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of drizzle. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
